EmailTemplate.name: 2019.11.25 - BS - Monthly Offer #2 (reminder).BS - Monthly Offer #2 (reminder)
EmailTemplate.subject: 15% OFF Entire Order – 48 Hours Left!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To say ‘thank you’ for your business, here’s 15% OFF** your next purchase of $100 or more – that’s an extra deal on these great deals too.
Hurry, offer ends November 27, 2019. Use code 1911SAVE <!-- ${CTAText} <!-- <[[${CTALink}]]> Save 50% on Select Notebooks Shop Now Save 50% on Storage Shop Now Save 50% Desk Sets & Accessories Shop Now Save 40% on Swiffer Cleaning Products Shop Now Save 40% on Select Floortex Chair Mats Shop Now Save 30% on Lexmark Multifunction Laser Printer Shop Now Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1911SAVE at checkout. Not valid on bottled water, services, printing, hardware, software or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires November 27, 2019. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
